bibl.title: Bacchylides Fr. 60 M. and the Kassandra.

bibl.note: Discussion of the identification and classification of Bacchylides' fr. 60 M. in connection with the poem Kassandra in P. Oxy. XXIII, 2368 (= M.-P.3 177.1; LDAB 441), 1, 9-20. - The poet and the title. - Fr. 60 M. and the Kassandra. - Avec résumé en anglais.
